dmca.title: FW: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by www.cg-corporation.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Peter [mailto:peter98@internode.on.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2006 7:44 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by
www.cg-corporation.com

PLEASE REMOVE THIS AND ALL OTHER PERSONALLY IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
INCLUDING THE SIGNATURE FROM THIS EMAIL WHEN SENDING ON TOI ANY OTHER
PARTIES.





Service Provider(s)

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries



Name of Agent Designated to Receive Notification of Claimed Infringement

Sean Adair, CG-Corporation



Full Address of Designated Agent to Which Notification Should be Sent

3 Cowper Pl Barden Ridge Sydney NSW 2234



Telephone Number of Designated Agent

(02) 9543 7540



Facsimile Number of Designated Agent



E-Mail Address of Designated Agent

cg0wnzyou@hotmail.com

Sean has been distributing this photograph of me,
http://www.cg-corporation.com/bored/quiet%5e.jpg, via his web site. He has
no permission from me to host or distrubute this photograph.

I would like this picture removed from your servers.

The information to my belief in this email is correct and true.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
To: <peter98@internode.on.net>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2006 9:43 AM
Subject: FW: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by
www.cg-corporation.com


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does 
> not substantially comply with the required notification elements of 
> the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
>
> Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your 
> claim.
>
> Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
>
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2006 9:00 AM
> To: copyright@theplanet.com
> Cc: The Planet Policy Enforcement
> Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted 
> by www.cg-corporation.com
>
>
> For your review.
>
> Martin Gaston
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/
>
> Begin forwarded message:
>
>> From: "Peter" <peter98@internode.on.net>
>> Date: January 4, 2006 7:02:55 AM CST
>> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
>> Subject: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by 
>> www.cg-corporation.com
>> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>>
>> Hi I believe you host this site.
>>
>> It has amoung other suspect content a picture of me. The owner of the 
>> site has been distributing it and hosting it on his site for some 
>> time at http://www.cg-corporation.com/bored/quiet%5e.jpg.
>>
>> If this is not removed and other illiegal content not investigated 
>> immediately i will be contacting the relevant authorities.
>>
>> Peter.
>>
